content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER, warning: [not receiving electricity]).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with warning [out of fuel]; holds a fluid box of approximately 190 units of water at temperature 15, with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5). (Fluid system updated to [76638].)
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) (status: WORKING) delivering about 99 units of water and now associated with fluid system [76638].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 76638 (status: WORKING).
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 76637 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 76650 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 76649 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 76645 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 76654 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 76653 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 76656 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 76657 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 76658 (status: EMPTY).
• Multiple repositioning attempts on the steam engine (using fluid_system values 75974, 76058, 76140, 76224, 76306, 76390, 76472, 76556) did not yield a valid candidate; the structure remains unaltered.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
  - Ensure that inventory items are accessed only through supported attributes to prevent mismatches and attribute errors.

• Steam Engine Repositioning:
  - Repositioning attempts failed due to absence of candidate pipe groups with the specified fluid_system values [75974, 76058, 76140, 76224, 76306, 76390, 76472, 76556] within a 10-tile radius of Position(-5.5, 19.5). Verify the placement of pipeline entities or adjust search parameters to secure valid candidates.
